name: places/ChIJmwKNs8Fh6KgRxD8zrgnLHn8
formattedAddress: 387 Park Ave S 4th floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Frank Barone, Licensed Real Estate Agent

adrFormatAddress: 387 Park Ave S 4th floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
Frankie is the BEST real estate agent in NYC. What started out initially as a search for a rental culminated in the purchase of my first home due to his knowledge of the market and business savvy.

From our first meeting, he took the time to get to know me, my lifestyle and assessed the type of home I was looking for. His intuition was on point from the first batch of homes shared, as he understood my taste right away.

Frankie made himself available for countless questions and his network is unparalleled – he is well connected with interior designers, mortgage bankers, lawyers, etc. Frankie was extremely patient in taking me back to certain apartments three, four times and I never once felt pressure to put in an offer until I found something I truly loved.

I cannot thank Frankie enough for his expertise and making what could’ve been a stressful experience extremely fun! His positivity and charisma are infectious, which made him a joy to work with. Frankie has also helped several friends and family find rentals, so he really can do it all!

originalText.text: Frank Barone was our realtor while purchasing our first owned home in NYC. I don't think he could have made the process more seamless for my husband and me. Moving is always complex. However, Frank’s hard work paid off when he made it seem easy to find us the perfect spot. Frank thinks about things proactively before they even happen and always follows up, making him an intelligent, fast-thinking realtor with a personable, caring charisma that's irreplaceable. You enjoy being around his presence and buying a home with him — he is honest, communicative, loyal, and always there for your needs at all times of the day. His attention to detail is impeccable, and we could not have asked for someone better to find us our special place. Thank you so much, Frank, we adore you. We will use you forever. Thanks for being so reliable and attentive. He is so naturally great at being a realtor, and stands out.

originalText.text: Frankie helped me find the rental property of my dreams. The process was seamless because Frankie is a professional to his core. He made me feel taken care of and asked the important questions that I didn’t even know I had. Through his guidance and care I landed on an EXCEPTIONAL place to call home. I definitely couldn’t have done it without him and can’t wait for him to help me find a place for purchase when the time comes.

originalText.text: Frankie helped me find my dream home and I couldn’t recommend him more. He is professional and will work incredibly hard to find you the right space to fit your needs. He listens and is able to quickly take feedback and move the process forward. He is on top of every step of the process and he made sure I was always up to date on things. He is also a really fun person to be around - I had so much fun working with him and can’t imagine working with anyone else!

originalText.text: I would highly recommend Frank to anyone making the move to or within NYC. I couldn't have asked for a smoother process of finding an apartment, no less while currently in a different country. Frank has excellent knowledge of NYC and available areas, works in a very time efficient manner, and is super friendly and professional throughout all of this. Took my stress levels of finding a place in the city from a 10 to a 0. Couldn't have asked for better!
